channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell EMC -- RecoverPoint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell EMC -- RecoverPoint

item.title: CVE-2019-3727|2024-08-04T19:19:18.102Z -- dell%20emc -- recoverpoint
item.description: Dell EMC RecoverPoint versions prior to 5.1.3 and RecoverPoint for VMs versions prior to 5.2.0.2 contain an OS command injection vulnerability in the installation feature of Boxmgmt CLI. A malicious boxmgmt user may potentially be able to execute arbitrary commands as root.
